author: J. Edward Moreno
title: Nurses protest at White House over lack of protective gear
description: At least a dozen nurses on Tuesday protested outside the White House demanding the administration take action to acquire more personal protective equipment (PPE), reading aloud the names of  50 nurses who have died ...
content:
At least a dozen nurses on Tuesday protested outside the White House demanding the administration take action to acquire more personal protective equipment (PPE), reading aloud the names of  50 nurses who have died of coronavirus.
